params.base: The address of the base asset.
params.quote: The address of the quote asset.

returns.out: The quote amount in quote asset.

params.base: The address of the base asset.
params.quote: The address of the quote asset.

returns.askOut: The ask quote amount in quote asset.
returns.bidOut: The bid quote amount in quote asset.

getQuote(uint256,address,address).notice: Returns the quote for a given amount of base asset in quote asset.

getQuotes(uint256,address,address).notice: Returns the bid and ask quotes for a given amount of base asset in quote asset.

name().notice: Returns the name of the price oracle.
